name: cuttlebone
description: ukagaka shell renderer for web browser

scripts.build: rm -rf output/*; rm -rf lib/*; npm run build-coffee; npm run build-src; npm run build-test; npm run espower; npm run concat-src;
scripts.espower: for i in `find output/test -name test*.js`; do node node_modules/espower-cli/bin/cmd.js $i > $i.esp.js; done
scripts.concat-src: cat output/coffee/header.js output/coffee/NamedManager.js output/coffee/Named.js output/coffee/Scope.js output/coffee/Balloon.js output/coffee/BalloonSurface.js output/src/PNGReader.js output/src/PNG.js output/src/Shell.js output/src/Surface.js output/src/SurfaceUtil.js output/src/SurfaceRender.js output/coffee/footer.js > lib/cuttlebone.js
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; tsd update --save --overwrite
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build; npm run start; npm run demo; npm run watch-test

author: Ikagaka
